tasks.prompt: Open any book detail page in the Autoppia Books app and stop there.

tests.description: Check that a book detail page was opened.

relevant_data.note: This is a hand-crafted task used only to verify the benchmark plumbing with a fixed agent.

tasks.prompt: Trigger an event that the fixed model will never produce.

tests.description: This event is intentionally impossible for the fixed model, so the score should be 0.

relevant_data.note: Second demo task used to verify that an unsolved task yields raw_score=0.0.
